author: BigBig
description: We are BIGBIG. Join us. This task does not issue rewards. Pledging to this task means that you are interested in joining the Global Arithmetic DAO. The "Global Arithmetic DAO", oversees global mathematical computations that manage algorithms or computations fairly and transparently, across finance, data analysis, the sciences and blockchains. It’s a global, decentralized organization dealing with numbers and calculations using smart contracts and blockchain technology to ensure fairness and transparency. 我们是 BIGBIG。加入我们吧。此任务不发放奖励。完成此任务意味着您有兴趣加入 Global Arithmetic DAO。"Global Arithmetic DAO"负责监督全球数学计算，公平并且透明地管理金融、科学、数据分析和区块链领域的计算。这是一个全球性的去中心化组织，使用智能合约和区块链技术处理数字和计算，从而确保公平和透明。
